name: MERCHANDISE_ORDER_INFO
description: This table contains the order level information of merchandise orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: MERCH_SUPPLY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the merchandise record for the merchandise order.

columns.name: MERCH_SUPPLY_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: MERCH_ORIG_UNIT_PR
columns.description: This column contains the original unit price from the merchandise record when the it was sold from the outpatient pharmacy.

columns.name: ELIGIBLE_HEALTHCARE_EXPENSE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether merchandise item sold was an eligible healthcare expense at the time of sale, which qualifies it to be paid for with a healthcare expense account such as an FSA, HSA, or HRA. This is applicable only to retail merchandise sales. 'N' or NULL indicate that the merchandise is not considered an eligible healthcare expense.  'Y' indicates that the merchandise is considered an eligible healthcare expense.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the display name for the merchandise order.

columns.name: PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pharmacy record where the merchandise was sold.

columns.name: FEE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: For pharmacy fee orders, this is the fee type category ID for the order.
